extendedInfo.description: The best way to release your pressure! It's a simple yet addictive game that gives you a little hand exercise by dragging off a roll of toilet paper. # Single mode: See how fast that you can drag off a roll of toilet paper.# Multiple mode: Join paper racing to challenge other players!Get it, drag it, and beat your friends to be the fastest!

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Definetley install great time passer easy and great fun :-)
reviews.author: Georgia Gilmore

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: fu****g amazing love this game love its online features    soooo good should download it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun I like it ............
reviews.comment: It is fun but I wish you get more points if you go a certian speed. Other than that it was cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FUN & COOL APP !!!
reviews.comment: Easy to play along with your friends & simple, great job !!
reviews.author: Windi Primiadhi

reviews.title: I Love This Game So Much!
reviews.comment: This game is amazing!! Its fun and cool. Everyone should download this app. The only thing is can you add an achivement list. Please :)
reviews.author: Kenya Gay

reviews.title: Love it :3
reviews.comment: I installed it yesterday and i played it the whole night.. my finger hurts now doe cx so addictive !
reviews.author: Alicia Yo

reviews.title: Addicting and Fun
reviews.comment: It\'s easy, it\'s simple and it\'s really fun and addicting, love this game. Great job Elite Games!
reviews.author: Jason Huggins

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: All u do is pull toilet paper get it to waste time u cant get back :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: It won\'t even open. It asks 4 my name, and then the screen goes blank on my htc wildfire. Plz fix app sounds great...:(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too hard
reviews.comment: A really good game but it just gets too hard to progress without buying crystals. I bought some but you get so little for your money that I\'m not inclined to buy more. It\'s a shame because I enjoy the game but I\'m not prepared to spend any more of my life grinding away for little reward.
reviews.author: Randy Van Poecke

reviews.title: Fun.
reviews.comment: This game is simple but very fun and addicting. When I played it with my friends my screen is turning black! Because of this game my screen is already cracked. Loool. :totallyworthit:
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: I love this app because i can compete with my friends n its the best app ever downloaded
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: needs to add 10 coins per play
reviews.comment: Good but need more coins... you only get one each time u play so you have to play 500 times to get a new paper...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to love it.
reviews.comment: With new updated version, the multi mode doesn\'t work. Always says \"system busy\". Fix it within the next week, I\'ll be generous, or I\'m going to uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but...
reviews.comment: I like this game alot . It\'s very fun . However , we all do not want to spend real money on the coins to buy themes . So I hope you can fix this by letting us be able to get free coins by watching trailers or something in the next update !! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Serious talking: AWESOME! Never saw an app that mix a random and normal thing as toilet paper with race and online challenges. It may be silly and can stop for somr seconds, but it\'s simplicity and funny design beats all of its problems. Congratulations for who did it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good for boring moments
reviews.comment: Awesome game ,  love it sooooo much
reviews.author: Mariam Zubair

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Fun and addicting. Great way to pass the time. Downside: my fingers aching lol :D
reviews.author: Ashley Winchester

reviews.title: FUN but multi doesn\'t work please fix
reviews.comment: Looks really fun but multi mode doesn\'t work on my Acer iconia tab I would be greatful if u fixed
reviews.author: Steven Imbrenda

reviews.title: Very addicting!
reviews.comment: Great very addicting game, but the ads are a bit space taking especially when you click go racing. I would rate 5 stars if the ads were a bit smaller and maybe at the top of the screen just a suggestion. Not very furious about it but it would be nice. Good job though on such a great little game!
reviews.author: A Google User
